changelog:
### Iconify v6.7.0 has arrived! It has the following new changes:

## Feature Changes:
- __QS Panel Tiles:__
    - Fixed bootloop on android 14
- __QS Text Color:__
    - Fixed bootloop on android 14
- __Icon Shape:__
    - Added force round system icon shape
- __Xposed Menu:__
    - Added circle and dotted circle battery style (Thanks to [PixelXpert](https://github.com/siavash79/PixelXpert))
    - Allow keeping lockscreen dim while using transparent QS
    - Fixed xposed QS margin applying in px instead of dp
    - Fixed capitalization of first letter in custom clocks
    - Allow hiding QS notification footer buttons
    - Allow hiding header of silent notification section
    - Fixed status icons cut off while using large top margin on android 14
- __Misc:__
    - Updated some normal variant overlays for compatibility with pixel roms

## App Changes:
- Fixed reboot reminder not showing sometimes after update
- Updated translations
- And many more improvements...

Also included in this version are bug fixes and other improvements.
